div.p: The authors wish to acknowledge the support, inspiration, and feedback from International Solastalgia Collaborative participants: Mae Davenport, Phil Defoe; Jamie Harvie, Karina Heim, Brenda Hoppe, Robin Kemkes, Karen Lutsky, Leah Prussia, Kristin Raab, Stacey Stark, Melissa Walls, Erika Washburn. (For more information regarding the International Solastalgia Collaborative contact Thomas Beery at thomas.beery@hkr.se).
